channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My daughter’s boyfriend, a guest in my home, offered to powerwash part of my house — then demanded money
item.description: “The amount was about what I would have paid to get the whole house done, and not just one side.’

item.title: Encharge AI unveils EN100 AI accelerator chip with analog memory
item.description: EnCharge AI, a startup that raised $144 million to date, announced the EnCharge EN100, an AI accelerator built on analog in-memory computing.

item.title: Home buyers are finding the silver lining in a stalled housing market — especially if they’re in this group
item.description: Pending home sales fell in April as buyers pulled back amid economic uncertainty and volatility in the financial markets.

item.title: Trump administration rescinds Biden-era caution about crypto in 401(k) plans: What that means for you
item.description: It may take time to see cryptocurrency retirement-plan options.

item.title: Salesforce earnings were ‘not bad.’ So why is the stock having its worst day in a year?
item.description: Salesforce’s results weren’t enough to shed lingering growth fears.

item.title: DeepSeek R1-0528 arrives in powerful open source challenge to OpenAI o3 and Google Gemini 2.5 Pro
item.description: Additionally, the model’s hallucination rate has been reduced, contributing to more reliable and consistent output.

item.title: How Snowflake’s open-source text-to-SQL and Arctic inference models solve enterprise AI’s two biggest deployment headaches
item.description: New open-source efforts from Snowflake aim to help solve that unsolved challenges of text-to-SQL and inference performance for enterprise AI.

item.title: DanaBot takedown shows how agentic AI cut months of SOC analysis to weeks
item.description: Agentic AI played a decisive role in dismantling DanaBot, a Russian malware platform responsible for more than 50 million dollars in damages.
